programs.title: Paradise Hitters
programs.description: Girls competitive volleyball program. Year-round training 2–3x/week with league play and international competition pathways.

programs.title: Big Wave Riders
programs.description: Boys competitive volleyball program developing Bermuda's next generation of champions through structured training and competition.

programs.title: Men's National Team
programs.description: Representing Bermuda in ECVA, NORCECA, Island Games and US Open Championships.

programs.title: Women's National Team
programs.description: Silver medallists at the Nike International Volleyball Festival. Competing at ECVA and NORCECA level.

programs.title: Youth Camps
programs.description: March Break & Summer volleyball camps. Fun, skills, and great volleyball for young athletes.

programs.title: National Beach Team
programs.description: Senior and U19 beach programs representing Bermuda at ECVA and NORCECA international competitions.

programs.title: Coaching Program
programs.description: Volleyball Canada Level 1 & Level 2 coaching certifications offered each fall for aspiring coaches.
